job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.description: pstrongAbout BintistrongppbrppBintis mission is to increase equality of opportunity and help every person have a fair chance at lifenbspWith over 400000 youth in foster care in the United States we are reinventing child welfare through technology to help every child find a safe loving and stable family We partner with state county and private foster care agencies around the country helping them recruit and approve foster parents more quickly and empowering social workers by eliminating administrative paperwork Our software also helps match families with children and helps track services to biological families to get on their feet and reunify with their children Binti currently works with over 140 foster care agencies across 22 states Rhode Island New Mexico Hawaii and Washington have signed on to make our software their statewide solutionnbspppbrppOur goal is to be the endtoend modular child welfare data system solution Our Approvals and Placements modules are widely used and have significantly improved outcomesnbspAgencies working with us have approved 80 more families on average in their first year of using Binti with a 16 reduction in time to approve and 2040 savings in social worker time Our Case Management module is completing a pilot with our existing agencies and will be more widely available very soon We are also expanding our team to further develop 3 additional modulesppbrppBinti is a missiondriven software company based in Oakland CA We have raised our Series A led by Founders Fund and other investors include First Round Capital and Kapor CapitalppbrppstrongThe rolestrongppbrppThe ideal candidate is a selfmotivated multitasker and demonstrated teamplayer You will be a lead developer responsible for the development of new software products and enhancements to existing products You should excel in working with largescale applications and frameworks and have outstanding communication and leadership skillsnbspppbrppBinti currently has three modules  Approvals Placements amp Case ManagementnbspOur product is built on Ruby on Rails and React backed by a Postgres database hosted on Google Cloud and orchestrated with KubernetesppbrppstrongLocationstrongppThis role is open to candidates in the San Francisco Bay Area our office is in Oakland  and you would have the option to work from the office when it is safe to do so or fully remote candidates who are open to working core engineering hours 1000 am  400 pm PT for realtime collaboration with the teamppbrppstrongResponsibilitiesstrongpulliHelp architect both our frontend and backend to be flexible scalable and approachable to other engineersliliHelp our team move quickly and learn while maintaining a welcoming and supportive cultureliliPush our product so it continues to be a beautiful yet intuitive and accessible interface for users from all walks of lifeliliIdentify patterns and approaches within our code thatll allow it to be simplified and improvedliliBuild internal tools to help our technical account executive team buildout among other things complex custom forms including versioning and data migration toolsliliMaintain HIPAA compliance for sensitive data that is shared with usliulpbrppstrongExperience amp SkillsstrongpulliAt least 4 years of professional software engineering experienceliliA selfmotivated experienced engineer who enjoys owning projects from inception to completionliliComfortable delving into the full stackliliEndtoend experience building shipping and maintaining productsliliHaving a growth mindset having a sense of urgency and being comfortable with challenging the status quoliliExperience coaching and mentoring colleagues to level up as a teamliliTrack record of breaking through walls on your way to successliliExcellent verbal written and interpersonal communication skillsliulpbrppstrongPerks amp BenefitsstrongpulliAn above market compensation package Base  EquityliliExcellentnbspmedical dental vision and life insurance benefitsliliFlexible vacation time to promote a healthy worklife blend targeting 20 daysyearnbsplili12 weeks of paid parental bonding leave for the arrival of a newborn or newly placed infantlili11 Federally observed holidays including Juneteenth  Election DayliliSickMental Health time separate from vacation days 72 hourslili4 weeks of sabbatical after 4 years of service at the companyliliPaid Jury DutyliliOption to allocate pretax dollars to 401K commuter benefits FSA and DCSA with administration paid forliliMonthly work from home stipend to help you succeed in a remote environment up to 100liliFocus on learning and development with opportunities to attend trainingsconferences onsite speaker series and lunch and learnsliulpbrppAt Binti we celebrate having a diverse team and believe our differences make us stronger Binti is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an equal opportunity employer We welcome all qualified applicants to apply without regard to race color religion gender sexual orientation national origin disability or protected Veteran statusp
